Texts.Chs: 在这样的价格下，我很乐意冒着这些【鬼魂】的危险去买一些免费的燃料。
Texts.Eng: At these prices, I'm just about willin' to risk these "ghosts" myself for some free fuel.
Floran hates the sssmell of gasoline.

Texts.Chs: 在某个月球上发生的每一件事，莱西亚都在不断地提高燃料的价格。。。
Texts.Eng: For every incident on some moon, Letheia just keeps spiking the price of fuel...

Texts.Chs: 他们又涨价了吗？这太荒谬了。。。
Texts.Eng: Have they raised the prices AGAIN? This is getting ridiculous...

Texts.Chs: 如果我不知道的话，我会说莱西亚为了赚钱而编造这些【鬼魂遭遇】。
Texts.Eng: If I didn't know any better, I'd say Letheia's making these 'ghost encounters' up for profit.

Texts.Chs: 莱西亚对厄尔吉斯的垄断使得现在星际旅行几乎不可能。
Texts.Eng: Letheia's monopoly on erchius is making intergalactic travel near impossible these days.

Texts.Chs: 这些价格简直是公路抢劫！
Texts.Eng: These prices are practically highway robbery!
